meanings.definition: A person who is a fan of statistics, especially in sports.
meanings.sent1: As a statto, he loves analyzing sports numbers.
meanings.sent2: The statto at the game always has interesting stats to share.
meanings.sent3: The statto joked that he could predict the winner based on stats alone.
meanings.sent4: Her brain worked like a statto, crunching numbers effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The statto's passion for statistics was unmatched by anyone else.

meanings.definition: To provide statistical information or analysis.
meanings.sent1: She will statto the data before presenting it to the team.
meanings.sent2: It is important to statto the trends before making a decision.
meanings.sent3: He decided to statto the numbers one more time, just to be sure.
meanings.sent4: The report will statto the growth of the company over the past year.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to statto the results thoroughly for accuracy.

meanings.definition: A website or database that focuses on statistics.
meanings.sent1: The statto is a great resource for sports enthusiasts.
meanings.sent2: I always check the statto for the latest statistical updates.
meanings.sent3: She spent hours browsing the statto for interesting data.
